record.id: field.name="type" and file.name="expline" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: type
record.file.name: expline

detail.detail: Parts: Used to compute the cost of parts used in servicing a contract, Service Manager searches in the model table.
Labor: Used to compute the cost of labor involved in servicing a contract, Service Manager searches in the operator table for the technician's hourly rate.
Outage: Used to compute the cost resulting from outages, Service Manager searches the service level agreement (SLA) for the configuration item in question.
Handling: Used to compute the cost resulting from handling a customer Interaction, Service Manager searches the Service Desk Interaction report.
Other: This area is available for user tailoring. Creating your own expenditure type is an advanced procedure.
